title: Tentative settlement, valued at $997 million, reached with families of victims of Surfside condominium collapse - CNN
content:
1. Tentative settlement, valued at $997 million, reached with families of victims of Surfside condominium collapse  CNN
  2. Surfside Condo Collapse Victims Reach $997 Million Settlement  The New York Times
  3. Nearly $1B settlement reached in Florida condo collapse, lawyers say  WMTW Portland
  4. Watch lawyer present $997 million settlement for Surfside victims. Hear judgeâ€™s reaction  Miami Herald
  5. Condo collapse victims reach $997 million settlement  CBS Evening News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A tentative settlement worth nearly $1 billion has been reached with multiple entities over the collapse last year of a residential building in Surfside, Florida, that killed 98 people, according to an attorney for plaintiffs in a class-action lawsuit.
